txt.en: Give a tasty treat to a Broadacres bunny
Give a tasty treat to a Redhorn rabbit
Give a tasty treat to a Heathfells hare
Radagast can be found in Rhosgobel.\n\nYou should speak with Radagast.
'Use the special food I have given you.'
'I am glad your travels were a success.'
Rabbits can be found all over Middle-earth.\n\nRescue rabbits using Radagast's calming treats.
Give a tasty treat to a Calembel cottontail
Give a tasty treat to a Coomb coney
You give a tasty treat to the rabbit!
You give a tasty treat to the rabbit!
You give a tasty treat to the rabbit!
'Use the special food I have given you to befriend some rabbits. They'll be safe in Rhosgobel where I can tend to them. I'm counting on you, [placeholder].'
You give a tasty treat to the rabbit!
You give a tasty treat to the rabbit!
Radagast the Brown asks you help him rescue rabbits and bring them back to the safety of Rhosgobel.

'Ah, thank you! I see you were able to bring back a couple of rabbits with you. I am glad your travels were a success.\n\n'You have a good rapport with the animals. This skill will aid you on your journeys ahead.'
